page.title: 01Littlehampton
page.content: The area of study was the twelve grid squares which make up most of the town of Littlehampton. The text of the study looks at local history with pages on Old Churches and old Littlehampton town. The study also looks at school life in primary schools ,based on Connaught and Clymping junior schools and secondary school life based on The Littlehampton School.The pupils look at types of games,school routine and types of lessons. Page no.9 looks at local news stories associated with Littlehampton.Ford Open Prison is dealt with on page 6 with a diary of a prisoner's day.The development of Littlehampton's industry and importance as a seaside resort is given on pages 2,7 .
